TextView.android:text: My name is Anna, I’m 28 years old. I was born and currently live in Irkutsk. I’m living with my long-term boyfriend and our cat Fluffy. I’m the head of marketing department in a local web development company. Me and my boyfriend love traveling around Russia, we’ve been to 20 cities so far. I’m an open and outgoing person, and my friends say I’m a good conversationalist.
